title: Pressley condemns ‘rogue’ ICE agents’ arrest of Everett boy, 13
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News “He is a 7th-grader who should have been met with compassion and care, not criminalized and sent to an adult prison,” Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley said.
Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley.

title: DA: Man arrested for murder of Worcester woman who disappeared in 2009
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The 36-year-old Worcester woman was never seen again after her disappearance, and her murder went unsolved until last month.
A Mississippi man was arrested for the murder of a Worcester woman who disappeared 16 years ago, prosecutors announced Friday.
Albert Carabba, 64, of Ocean Springs, Miss.

title: Trump said Harvard has seen violent crime skyrocket. Data from campus police says otherwise.
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The Harvard Crimson editorial board slammed the Trump administration's claim that crime has risen on campus, citing university police data showing that most crimes on campus have declined.
A banner on the Harry Elkins Widener Memorial Library at the Harvard University campus in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Bloomberg The editorial board of Harvard’s student newspaper blasted the Trump administration’s claim that crime at the university has “drastically risen,” pointing to campus police data showing that crime reports have dropped over the past year.
